entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
